document_data.mainbody:
olly Huldane was a tall, impressive-looking ranger who lived in the forests of Shadowdale in 1369 DR. Her animal companion was a falcon, who she would summon when she determined people to not be a threat.
Holly wore chainmail armor and wielded a shortbow, a shield and +1 longsword. She often kept potions of healing, gold and gems on her person.
